column5: With a few trips planned this summer (and an early summer birthday) I got myself a light weight campign chair The chair is very small, light and easy to pack - my full review is up https://www.northernjacks.com/post/product-review-helinox-one-chair Overall I am happy but didn't give it the full send endorsement Thanks for checking it out Andrew
2lb and it is pretty small... I am wondering how it is going to work for you in the long run.
Seems to me that the only draw back would be the bugs dinning on your kidneys! HH

It is definitely light and easy to pack.  If she holds up I will be happy w the purchase I think.   Talk is brewing about an adventure further into the park for spring trout so it will be a good test for endurance and kidney bugs! Andrew
Hang some burlap over that and it might be a good turkey chair. Doug
